resources.string: Your account has been deleted, you must now uninstall the application.
You must complete a profile that represents you, before inviting a contact. Proceed?
Allow app to access Camera in system settings.
Allow app to access Microphone in system settings.
Allow app to access Microphone and Camera in system settings.
This contact has deleted this relation with you and is no longer reachable.
You must complete a profile that represents you in this group. Proceed?
Are you sure you want to delete it?
This image/video format is not supported by the application.
Maximum number (%1$d) of group members exceeded.
You have been removed from the group
Warning, if you don’t use the application often enough, the OS may not wake it up to exchange messages!
There is not enough space on your device to complete the migration. Close the application, free up some space, and relaunch the app to complete the update.
One of the two devices does not have enough storage space. Free up space on that device before restarting the migration.
Please, disable Airplane mode and connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile network.
No network access to the twinme service.
Try to connect to another network.
Wi-Fi is disabled and there is no mobile Internet connection.
Please, turn on Wi-Fi or activate a mobile Internet connection.
Operation not authorized by your contact.
Permission to access the camera is required to take a new photo or video.
Permission to access the camera is necessary to scan a QR code.
You need to enter the image that represents you to the contacts you invite with this profile.
You need to define the name that represents you to the contacts you invite with this profile.

twinme is a secure chat voice/video calls service with no access to personal information.\n\ntwinme is based on WebRTC, the new standard for secure (end-to-end encrypted) peer-to-peer (no relay server) real-time multimedia communications on the web.
The application\'s source code is available as Open Source on GitHub, under the AGPL-3.0 license.
%1$s invites you to join the group
You already have a relation with this contact. Do you want to create a new one?
You cannot establish a relationship with yourself within the same account.
Your account, along with all associated data, will be permanently deleted. Confirm?
Are you really sure you want to delete your account?
A new account is created when installing the app for the first time, after re-installing the app, or resetting the device, or deleting the current account.
No trace of previous account and data remains, so you’ll have to re-invite your contacts.

An account migration service is available to transfer your account with all associated data (contacts, messages, groups, etc.) from one Android device to another in real-time. You can thus switch accounts between an old device and a new one.
Close the application and restart it to access your data.
Close the application and restart it to access the new data.
Are you sure you want to cancel the migration?
Not enough space to download the database
Not enough space to upload the database
Awaiting receipt of files and database.
Display this screen on each device, and one scans the other’s QR-Code.
This device is using an old incompatible OS version, which will cause all the relations on the target device to be lost during the transfer. Do you still want to proceed with the transfer?
The target device is using an old incompatible OS version, which will cause all your relations to be lost during the transfer. Do you still want to proceed with the transfer?
To launch migration, scan this QR-code from the other device
Scan the QR code displayed in the \"Account / Transfer from another device\" section of the side menu of the other device.
Add a participant to this call
Open the web address %1$s with twinme on your mobile device or scan the QR-Code to connect privately with “%2$s”
Ask your friend near you to scan your invitation QR-code with twinme, or tap the "Scan" button to scan your friend’s code.
twinme does not know your friends and cannot discover them. You must invite them personally, with twinme when they are near you, or by sending them an invitation by other means.
This link is not managed by the application.
This link corresponds to a \"click to call\"
This link corresponds to a contact invitation
This link corresponds to an account migration
This link corresponds to a call transfer
Send the code via an application
Do you want to hangup the call?
Your contact has not granted the permissions required for a call (e.g., microphone, camera).
Call ended: %1$s has deleted this relation with you.
Your relation with %1$s is now certified.
%1$s must allow video calls to be able to certify a relation via a video call.
To certify this relation, you must scan the QR-Code displayed on %1$s’s device.
To certify this relation, %1$s’s device must scan this QR-Code.
A \"certified\" relation ensures that you are always communicating with the right person, even if the service has been compromised by a third party.
Be sure you always communicate with the right person!
This fingerprint must be identical on both devices.
Do you want to call back %1$s?
You have not made any calls yet.
Are you sure you want to reset all call notifications?
Attention! You must allow battery usage when the app is running in the background to avoid microphone cuts during a call.
Ask %1$s to allow you to control their camera during the video call.
%1$s would like to control your camera during the call. You can regain control at any time.
%1$s does not allow you to control his/her camera.
If your contact allows it, you can take control of their camera during a video call and zoom in by yourself, for example. This is particularly useful for controlling a video surveillance camera.
With your loved one\'s permission, you can control their camera during a call to help them remotely, easily and securely.
%1$s did not validate the word. The certification of the relation failed and you will need to try again.
The video call allows you to identify each other and exchange the security keys associated with a certified relation and its exchanges.
Each in turn, spell the word displayed on your screen that the other can verify. Once all the words are verified, your relation with %1$s will be certified.
The call must be on video to be able to certify the relation.
Tap here to add a participant to this call
Is the word said by %1$s identical?
The audio stream has been redirected to a Bluetooth device.
The audio stream has been redirected to the speaker.
The call could not go thru, error: %1$d.
The maximum number of participants in a group call has been reached (%1$d).
%1$s’s app version is not compatible with group calls and needs an update.
%1$s will be able to compare it with the one on his/her screen.
Invite a contact to join the ongoing call
The on-going call has been transferred.
Place the QR code in this rectangle to scan it.
Camera is required to scan a twincode
Deletion is irreversible. Export important contents before proceeding. Proceed?
An error occurred during the operation.
Deleting messages, media, and files from this conversation does not remove them from your contact’s device, and you will not be able to do so later.
Deleting messages, media, and files from this conversation also removes them from your contact’s device.
Media thumbnails are not removed from the conversation; only original files are deleted.
Files, photos, videos and voice notes exchanged in this conversation will be deleted from both your device and your contact’s device.
Messages of any type in the conversation (text, photo, video, voice, files, etc.) will be deleted from the application.
Resetting this conversation will delete all messages, including those on your contact’s device.
Select what you want to delete.
Allow this contact to call you
Caution: this setting activates automatic answering of calls from this contact, opening the device microphone and camera (for video calls).
Some devices may restrict this feature.
You can ask your contact with access to the premium version of the app to control your camera during your video calls.
Allow this contact to automatically take control of your camera during a video call.
Allow the contact to call you by voice.
Does not display contact name in notifications, and does not record calls in calls history.
Set dates/times when you don’t want to be called.
Schedule the dates/times you want to be called.
Allow the contact to video call you.
Invite someone to scan your invitation code, or else, scan theirs…
Scan or enter an invitation code
Your message has indeed been deleted.
The message can only be edited on your contact’s device if their app is up to date.
Long press on the send arrow to delete this message from the conversation after a certain time.

The twinme version of your contact is not fully functional.
Please ask him/her to perform a twinme update.
Ask your contact to update twinme
I invite you to join the group
Main contents have been deleted locally.
Operation not allowed by the sender

Warning: it is not possible to prevent the recipient from copying/saving/sharing a document (pdf, word, ppt, excel, zip, etc.), which can only be opened outside the application. Do you still want to send it?
This file is large (%1$d MB). Would you like to continue ?
Allow recipient to copy/save/share this content
You can resize to standard definition (SD) for faster transfer.
Do you want to accept it?
Your conversation with %1$s does not contain any of these elements.
Display a preview of the web site.
End-to-end encrypted messages are exchanged in peer-to-peer, directly from device to device, without an intermediate distribution server = no traces in the cloud.
This profile is displayed to guests who will call you with this \"click-to-call\" link.
\"Click-to-call\" allows guests to call you from a browser without installing the application.
Each instance has a name, image, and description, representing the subject of the call, such as:
a video doorbell for delivery people.
A \"click-to-call\" has attributes to specify whether it is:
always open or limited to a specific date and time.
Share the \"click-to-call\" link or QR-code through the channels allowing to reach relevant people, e.g.:
an insert on a classified ads platform
an email to the people invited to the group call
a sign on your front door for delivery people.
Recipients scan the QR-code and open the link in a browser on their mobile device or PC. They can then:
Change the default name (Guest) representing them on the call
Call you by pressing the \"Call\" button on the web page.
After the call, they may keep the web page open to call you back.
Allow group members to invite their contacts
Allow members to invite other members as personal contacts
Allow group members to post messages
Both name AND image are essential for your contacts to recognize and differentiate you from others.
This Profile information is used to invite contacts.
Enter a profile (name & image) that represents you to your contacts.
Profiles allow you to invite contacts to create relationships with you on the application. You can have as many Profiles (persona) as you want, each associated with a particular "Space".
Each “Profile” has a “Name” and an “Image” (required), seen by the contacts you invite, and used as your initial Profile associated with the newly created relationships of that "Space".
Once created, each relationship has its own pair of “Profiles” representing you and your contacts to each other.
You can then modify how you wish to be known to each of your contacts, on each relationship, independently.
This name and image are used to invite your contacts and initialize your relations. You will be able to modify and customize them for each relation.
"Spaces" are local and not visible to contacts.
"Spaces" help you organize your contacts according to which of your social circles they belong to, eg. Family, Friends, Business, Fun, etc.

Each “Space” is associated to a “Profile” representing the persona you want to use when interacting with the contacts from the social circle of that "Space", eg., Dad, Johny, Dr. John Doe, Batman, etc.
"Spaces" are local to your application on your device. They are only visible to you and not by your contacts, nor the service servers.
- a “Name”, representing a specific social circle you interact with
- an “Image” allowing you to identify it quickly in your list of "Spaces"
- a color “Theme”, to personalize its look & feel
- “Settings” that can be specific to each particular "Space", thereby overridding the default values defined by the application Settings.
This profile is associated to the code used to transfer an on-going call to a browser.
Type the letters \"OK\" below to confirm the deletion of the account.

Your account has been deleted and all associated data have been destroyed.
You must close the application.
Are you sure you want to delete this relation?
This contact will no longer be able to reach you.
Deleting this profile will void its associated invitation code. Confirm deletion?
Are you sure you want to delete this \"Click-to-Call\" code?
This \"Click-to-Call\" link will no longer be usable.
to all contacts in this Space
Propagate the image, name, or description you just modified:
to all unless they are personalized
You can propagate your invitation profile changes to your existing contacts, or not.
You cannot remove the active profile
Once the relation has been created, it is strongly recommended to certify it to reinforce its security.
This code is invalid. It may have already been used or expired.
Once the relation has been created, don’t forget to certify it to reinforce its security.
Enter the Mini-Code provided by your contact to create a relation.
A contact gave you a 6-character Mini-Code to create a relation. This single-use Mini-Code expires 24 hours after its creation.
The contents of conversations will be exported in a ZIP file.
Do not leave the screen during the export operation.
Retrieving the contents of the conversation with %1$s is in progress.
Retrieving the contents of conversations is in progress.
The contents of the conversation will be exported in a ZIP file.
Select the contents you want to export.\nOnly non-ephemeral contents, authorized to be copied/saved/shared, may be exported.
Fatal error, code %1$d.\nPlease restart the application, and report the issue via a feedback message, if you can. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Fatal error: %1$s
You must close the application.
Use this form to request access to your account data.
We appreciate your help in identifying issues and working with us to get them resolved.
A Debug Log contains only low-level technical data on application activities and behavior, and does NOT reveal any of your personal information.
This action invalidates the current invitation code associated with this profile. Are you sure you want to generate a new code?
Import or scan this invitation QR-Code with twinme to add this contact.
The group administrator did not authorize this action.
Are you sure you want to remove members from this group?
This action invalidates the current invite code associated with this \"click-to-call\" link. Confirm?
Generate a new code for this link
Open the web address %1$s or scan the QR-Code, to call “%2$s”.
Share this \"click-to-call\" code with someone who can then call you, from the web or mobile app.
to invite a contact when you don’t have access to the application.
The maximum number of active Mini-Codes allowed has been reached. You must wait 24 hours to generate new ones.
Mini-Codes are single-use and valid for 24 hours only. You can give them to your contacts to create a relation when you don’t have access to the application (e.g., without a phone).
It is strongly recommended to certify relations established with a Mini-Code to reinforce their security.
Ask your friend near you to scan the QR-code of the \"room\" with twinme, or tap the invitation code to copy it to the clipboard.
Your twinme account on this device will be transferred to twinme+.
Make sure you update both devices to the latest version of the app before starting the transfer, to avoid losing all your relations.
Resetting this conversation will delete all messages, including those on your contact’s device. Confirm?
Resetting this conversation will delete all messages from each group member’s device. Confirm?
Resetting this conversation will remove all messages from your device. Confirm?
You need to upgrade to twinme+ in order to use this feature. You will be able to migrate all your account data.
You will be able to migrate all your account data.
twinme is available as a premium version with even more features.
Some old messages have been deleted.
invites you to join a group.

Invite contacts to join an ongoing voice/video call.
Lock the application with biometric services or with a PIN code.
And hide the application when it goes into the background, if the device allows it.
Unlock access to the application using your device biometric or passcode authentication services. You can still answer incoming calls and receive notifications while access to the app is locked.
This option requires a version of Android > 5.0
This profile allows you to invite your contacts to establish a private relationship with you, under your control.
Paste or type a proxy’s URL
This proxy is already configured in your app.
You have reached the limit of the number of allowed proxies (%1$d). To add a new one, you must first remove one.
Use a proxy from the list below, only if the application cannot connect to the service without a proxy.

When access to the app’s signaling servers is blocked in your country, proxies can bypass these blocks in many circumstances and allow you to communicate privately. In addition to the in-app proxies, you can create your own or use a proxy created by someone else. Proxies cannot access the contents being exchanged under any circumstances.
Use a proxy only if you can’t connect to the service from standard Wi-Fi or cellular networks.
Open the %1$s link with twinme on your device to automatically configure this proxy.
Share this proxy with those who can no longer connect to the service due to blocking attempts.
Do you want to use this proxy’s URL ?
Warning! This proxy’s URL does not allow you to connect to the app’s service.
Without these permissions, messages may take a very long time to reach their destination.
Allow app to run in background
Change app permissions in system settings.

Encrypted messages are exchanged directly between devices in real time, using a "peer-to-peer" approach, without content distribution servers. This ensures there are no trace in the cloud and provides unique privacy protection.
To ensure a good quality of service, configure your device to allow the application to receive notifications in the background and exclude it from battery optimizations.
Use the app frequently so the OS prioritizes it, and doesn’t terminate it unexpectedly. \n\nAnd don’t forget to inform your contacts about this!
Allow app to use mobile data in the background.
Allow app to receive push notifications.
Allow app to run in background.
The only administrator cannot be removed.
Enter or paste an invitation link
Check the status of your connection to the service

By default, the application does not integrate the Android calling experience, as this integration can cause call reception problems in certain situations and on certain devices. You can enable this integration for better call management, if you are not experiencing these problems.
Allow recipients to copy/save/share your contents
Resolution of media contents sent in a conversation: high definition requires more data and therefore more transmission time.
These parameters are used as defaults at the application level.
Reset notification settings to application defaults.
Allow participants to invite other participants as personal contacts
Allow participants to invite their contacts
Participants feedback is only seen by administrators/moderators
Participants can post messages seen by everyone
Share this code to receive external calls.
Call scheduled for a date and time defined elsewhere.
This relation is being established. Please wait.
Define what your contact is allowed to do in this relation with you.
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
You will leave this group and you will no longer be able to access its conversations.
Are you sure you want to delete this group?
This group will be deleted for all its members and its conversations will be erased.
Customize conversations background with a color or image.
I forgot my ballet shoes… Can you bring them with you please?😘
A Space is where your different personalities meet your multiple social circles, including the most secret ones.

Call transfer code saved in the photo gallery.

Call ended: %1$s has deleted this relation with you.
By pressing %1$s, I confirm that I have read and accept:
Messaging & high-definition voice/video calls protecting privacy by design.
Secure "peer-to-peer" communications: no traces in the cloud.
No phone number, no address book, no user-id: you choose how you want to be identified based on who you are communicating with.
